p: The coumaronochromone named eriocoumaronochromone ( 72) was isolated for the first time from an EtOH extract of the twigs of E. robustum, along with desmoxyphyllin A ( 74) ( Awouafack et al., 2018). Lupinalbin A ( 73) was proven in methanol extracts of the aerial and underground parts of E. laurentii ( Ateba et al., 2014b; 2016b) and in a dichloromethane/methanol (1:1 v/v) root extract of E. psoraleoides ( Wanyama, 2010).
